parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: Page number for paginated queries. Default value: 1.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
Set the language type for the request and response messages, default is **zh_cn**.
Values:

- **zh_cn**: Chinese (Simplified)
- **en_us**: English (United States)

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: When performing a paginated query, set the number of items per page. Default value is **10**.

parameters.name: UsageScenario
parameters.description:
API call scenario, default is **null**.
Values:
- **null**: Old version
- **0**: Old version
- **1**: New version
